channel.title: Agents on Oras Al-Kubaisi

item.title: Can AI agents do scraping without guidance? Yes
item.description: AI Agents - for scraping. With agents able to run code safely now, I wanted to test their abilities to scrape data from websites without specifying any input requirements such as elements or classes. The result is shockingly good, considering I spent less than 4 hours doing it. The challenge I didn’t want to use a fully-fledged agent framework; I wanted to write one agent that would give feedback to itself if there were any errors to learn and iterate.
